content: That's really helpful, thank you! I've been experimenting with different techniques and mediums, and I'm excited to try glazing. By the way, I just started using my new art journal to document my progress, ideas, and inspirations today, and I think it's going to be a great tool to help me stay focused and motivated. Speaking of which, do you have any tips on how to effectively use an art journal, or any prompts to get me started?
